attributes.action: pass a law, which will require all businesses to quote prices inclusive of VAT when dealing with consumers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many businesses, often workmen, garages but also large businesses, quote prices excluding VAT. The consumer is then faced with much higher prices than originally quoted. A law requiring all businesses to quote prices inclusive of VAT when dealing with consumers would provide more transparency and avoid the potential dishonesty of the current situation. The responsibility of deciding whether a customer is a retail customer or another business should lie with the supplier.
